nodes.text: Mag Zaroff was a fierce female Jedi hunter alive during the Imperial Era. She was Force-sensitive and could levitate objects to use against her prey. Calm and confident, Zaroff wore a long cloak and had a personal starship.

Mag Zaroff was a character conceived for the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order. Early in the game's development, she was imagined as the main antagonist. Ultimately, the antagonist became the Second Sister, although many of Zaroff's design characteristics were used for the character Merrin. Concept art of Zaroff was done by lead concept artist Jordan Lamarre-Wan and Gustavo Mendonca.
